buying: This has certainly been a bad experience & would conclude by saying that phone is good barring the display/screen quality & the service is pathetic & doesn't go with the price tag at all.
questions: 10th June, I was getting down from my car & my nexus 6 fell from my hands & one can imagine the height, it wasn't more than 4'.

message:
I purchased my nexus 6 on 3rd June, got it delivered on 4th June. I travelled to Shimla for work from 5th June to 9th June & in the meanwhile observed that battery was heating up pretty quickly while put on charging. In encountered this battery heating up issue 3-4 times at least & thought of registering a complaint regarding this issue post my trip. On the fateful morning, i.e. 10th June, I was getting down from my car & my nexus 6 fell from my hands & one can imagine the height, it wasn't more than 4'. My phone's screen got smashed from 3 sides & display also got damaged.
Now the real trouble begun for me, I called up Flipkart to check if my phone can be replaced & they said no since this was a physical damage. They guided me to Moto care & the nearest moto care I could find from my office was in Palam Vihar (B2X communications, G floor 13, spanish court chowk), there I met this guy Arun & he told me clearly to have an argument with Flipkart & they will replace my phone because its' not been even a week's usage, this happened on 11th June. Also, Moto care (Arun) told me that they didn't had the display that time & were sure that they will receive one by 12th June. One important thing that I was told by moto care is they cannot log in the call for a period of one month from the date of purchase. I called Flipkart & tried to figure out the details of their replacement policy, there also I had pathetic responses coming from all levels to customer service team, everybody at Flipfart uttered same thing in same tone that this doesn't come under replacement warranty & hence cannot be replaced. 
Next morning, i.e. 12th June I got a call from moto care (Arun) saying that he can log in the job sheet but doesn't have the screen & display at the moment. As soon as he receives, he will give me a call back. From that day I haven't received a call from moto care, whereas I have tried following up 3 times including a call made today, I am being told that they are running short of displays. 
They aren't ready to commit a date by when they will receive the display which they were supposed to receive by 12th June. This all has been happening when I am ready to shell out 12K on a phone purchased on 3rd after spending 42K.
This has certainly affected my work as well, as the back up phone I am using right now doesn't have all contacts, e-mails & what's app facility. It's been 9 days today & I haven't got a date from anyone, neither from Flipkart & nor from Moto care. 
Hope somebody senior from Flipkart or Motorola reads this review & help me in getting my phone repaired at the earliest. This has certainly been a bad experience & would conclude by saying that phone is good barring the display/screen quality & the service is pathetic & doesn't go with the price tag at all. It seems to me as if they only believe in selling & not in servicing people.
Hope my message reaches out to people who are considering this phone as an option for their purchase.
#Achhakiya maine jo mobile purchase kiya wo bui dead phone !!!

questions: how can you say that everything is fine in your phone.

message: i have been a regular customer of Flipkart for couple of years. and ordered dozons of items and having prompt service 99 out of 100. untill last one. which made me GONE MADE (literally gone made). i purchased a REDMI 2 phone on 25th may. to gift my younger brother on his birthday. i got this phone alone with airtel 4g ready sim.. but the internet on this phone never took off. its just doesnt work at all. it shows the H+ but nothing happens.  my brother told me its not working. i then myself checked it and i found that internet is not working at all. i have PURCHASED 4 micro sim cards from different different operators to test the phone. but no luck. internet just dont like to work in my redmi 2. however my cousin is having the same phone and my all 4 SIMS working flawless on her phone. i then thought to call customer care. they said our technical team will call you. i got a call from MR Nasir at 8:45 pm . i told him everything . he checked my phone with some smart app of flipkart. mobile data was not turning on.so i used wifi to check that app. and he said everything is fine there is no problem in ur phone. HE WAS SO RUDE...  am i fool here who is wasting time in making phones to customer care for hours. if its defective than its defective. how can you say that everything is fine in your phone. he doesnt have any courtesy. he didnt even apologize for inconvenience caused..  in my call of 20 minutes . he have told me to visit service centre..more than 30 times.  i work for the service industry too and i told him i dont have time to visit as my office is 30 KM far away from city. and i live alone here. but he was so rude that everything is fine. he showed my like i m deliberately creating issue. KINDLY CHECK MY PURCHASED HISTORY IF I VE CREATED AN ISSUE FOR NO REASON. i told him if you have replacement policy than kindly replace it. but he just kept saying your phone is not having any problem.. and he calls himself a senior technician.we purchase on flipkart oz its a BRAND... and if such things will keep persisting in your company that it would be shame for you. when he kept saying that you visit service centre. that at a time i said if i visit the service centre and they tell me that the handset is having some issue than i simply asked him that than i will ask for refund as i dont want to get into trouble if i get another DEFECTIVE PIECE. but MR Nasir said that it wont happen and do wat you want i wont let REFUND HAPPEN for you.  I m in complete DILEMMA after listning to all this. this was shocking for me. i simple want REFUND coz what happens if another peice i get will be a defective one. i ve already felt insulted on my brothers birthday. my order no is OD202942138538673700.. I ORDERED IT ON 25 MAY. MODEL NAME REDMI 2.  i still feel someone is listening to me in flipkart. WAITING FOR A CURE....
Totally waste of money experience if you will purchase any gadget so requesting to all users please don't by any electronic item as mobile from this drastic seller is name is flipkart !!!!!!!!!!!!!

HIGHLY DISSAPOINTED

Dear Flipkart,
I ordered an air conditioner on 26th of may 2015. Received it on 30th may 2015. Requested for installation on 1st June,2015 to a different address. I received a mail saying it will take 3-4 days but the customer service centre executive told me it will take 5-7 days. I waited for a week no response. I called again on 6th June 2015, I was told sir the address was not changed. I got it changed again and they said it will take 3 days maximum. I called again on 8th June 2015, I was told that the complaint had been closed because they received a notification that the air conditioner had already been installed. So I dismissed the claim and reregistered the request for installation and I was told they will get back to me in a day. I again called 9th June 2015 they told me sir we put you up in high priority and the issue will be taken care of. Then I called again on 13th June 2015 and they asked for 3 more working days and sent an email. Then on 15th June and Requested to talk to a senior executive and was transferred the call to Mr. Aslam (floor manager), He assured me that the problem will be solved and they will get back to me in the next 24 hours. I received no call. So again i called after those 24 hours and this time I spoke to Mr. Yusuf (floor manager) and I requested to return the product. He repeatedly told me not to and denied my request, instead he begged for 24 hours more and told me if he doesn't get back to me in 24 hours then I can return the product. Yet again I got no call and on today 18th June 2015 I called again and talked to floor manager Mr. Arindam Roy and asked for return of product and same as usual he didn't take the request and asked for 24 more hours. 

I am fed up of your after sales services. It's like you got your money and now the customer does not concern you at all. I have been waiting since 19 days in this scorching Delhi heat to get an air conditioner installed but I guess you will do it after the heat season is over. Now If I don't get the installation by tomorrow I will be sending you a notice as I will be filing a complaint of customer harassment in the consumer forum. I hope you look into it or else be sued for damages. 

Thankyou,
Yatharth Rohila
#shameonflipkart
#mostpoorservices
#dissapointingflipkart

buying: I even write to your customer care on 16th stating the reason why I need it to be delivered on or before 18th June.

message:
Dear Flipkart Team,

I ordered a Moto E 2nd Gen(4g) mobile phone on 13th of June 2015 (Order Id- WSRP3807983821) whose expected  delivery date was 18th June. I wanted to give it as a birthday present to my sister on her birthday which is on 18th June. But since 14th of June morning the order status of the shipment was not getting changed, so I called your customer care thrice till 18th june  to know the status of the shipment . I even write to your customer care on 16th stating the reason why I need it to be delivered on or before 18th June. But every time I got a reply from your side that product will be delivered to you on or before 18th June. But today on 18th June at 1 o'clock in the noon I got a call from your side stating that you can't delivered the product as even you people don't know where the shipment is and you are reshippng it and I will get it on 23rd June. 
Thanks Flipkart for breaking the trust and spoiling my sister's birthday. And plz don't fool people by showing your emotional same day delivery ad if you can't deliver the  product in a week and that too after continuous follow ups.

ಮಾನ್ಯ ವ್ಯವಸ್ಥಾಪಕರೆ,

ಕೆಲವು ದಿನಗಳಿಂದ ಫ್ಲಿಪ್ಕಾರ್ಟ್ನಲ್ಲಿ ತೋರುತ್ತಿರುವ ಜಾಹೀರಾತಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಹಿಂದಿ ಭಾಷೆಯನ್ನ ಬಳಸಲಾಗಿದೆ. ವ್ಯಾಪಾರದ ಜಾಹೀರಾತಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಸ್ಥಳೀಯ ಕನ್ನಡ ಭಾಷೆ ಬಳಸದೆ "ಹಿಂದಿ" ಭಾಷೆಯನ್ನು ಉಪಯೋಗಿಸುರವ ಕಾರಣವೇನು.
ಫ್ಲಿಪ್‌ಕಾರ್ಟ್ ಶುರುವಾದದ್ದು ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿನಲ್ಲೇ ಆದರೂ ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿನ ಭಾಷೆಯಾದ ಕನ್ನಡವನ್ನು ಕಡೆಗಣಿಸಿ, ಹಿಂದಿ ಉಪಯೋಗಿಸಿದರೆ ಯಾರನ್ನೂ ಮೆಚ್ಚಿಸಿ ವ್ಯಾಪಾರ ವೃದ್ದಿ ಆಗುವುದಿಲ್ಲ. ಸ್ಥಳೀಯರೆಲ್ಲರಿಗೂ ಹಿಂದಿ ಅಥವ ಇಂಗ್ಲೀಶ್ ಭಾಷೆ ಗೊತ್ತಿರುವುದಿಲ್ಲ. ಗೊತ್ತಿರಬೇಕಾದ ಅನಿವಾರ್ಯತೆ ಕೂಡ ಇಲ್ಲ. ಸಾಂವಿಧಾನಿಕವಾಗಿ ಸ್ಥಳೀಯ ಭಾಷೆಗೆ ಸಿಗಬೇಕಾದ ಗೌರವ ಕೊಟ್ಟರೆ, ಅಲ್ಲಿನ ಸ್ಥಳೀಯರು ತಂತಾನೇ ನಿಮ್ಮೊಂದಿಗೆ ವ್ಯಾಪಾರಕ್ಕೆ ಇಚ್ಛಿಸುತ್ತಾರೆ. 
ನನ್ನ ಮಿಂಚೆ:girishgowda81@rediffmail.com (ನವೆಂಬರ್-2011), ಹಾಗು ನಾನು ಇದೆ ಫ್ಲಿಪ್‌ಕಾರ್ಟ್ ನಲ್ಲಿ ಸ್ಯಾಮ್‌ಸಂಗ್ GT-I9001, ಫಿಲಿಪ್ಸ್ ವ್ಯಾಕ್ಯೂಮ್ ಕ್ಲೀನರ್, ಮೋಟೋ ಜಿ 2nd Gen, ಮೆಮೋರೀ ಕಾರ್ಡ್ ಇತರೆ ವಸ್ತುಗಲ್ಲನ್ನು ಖರೀದಿಸಿದ್ದೇನೆ. 40 ಸಾವಿರಕ್ಕೆ ವಸ್ತುಗಳ ಖರೀದಿ ಮಾಡಿದ್ದೇನೆ. ಆದ್ರೆ ನೀವು ವ್ಯಾಪಾರದ ಜಾಹೀರಾತಿನಲ್ಲ್ಲಿ ಹಿಂದಿ ಭಾಷೇ ಉಪಯೋಗಿಸಿರುವುದು ನನಗೆ ಬೇಸರ ಹಾಗೂ ಅಸಮಾಧಾನ ತರಿಸಿದೆ. ಸ್ಥಳೀಯ ಭಾಷೆಗೆ ಪ್ರಮುಖ್ಯತೆಯನ್ನ ನಮ್ಮ ಸಂವಿಧಾನ ಕೂಡ ಒತ್ತಿ ಹೇಳುತ್ತಾ, ಹಾಗಿರುವಾಗ ನೀವು ಹಿಂದಿ ಭಾಷೆಯ ಹೇರಿಕೆಯನ್ನು ಹಿಂದೀಯೇತರರ ಮಾಡುತಿರುವುದಕ್ಕೆ ನಾನಾ ಆಕ್ಷೇಪಣೆ ಇದೆ. ಹೀಗೆ ಮುಂದುವರಿದರೆ, ನಾನು ನನ್ನ ಫ್ಲಿಪ್‌ಕಾರ್ಟ್ ಅಕೌಂಟ್ ಅನ್ನು ಶಾಶ್ವತವಾಗಿ ಮುಚ್ಚಿ, ಮುಂದೆ ಯಾವುದೇ ವ್ಯಾಪಾರವನ್ನು ಫ್ಲಿಪ್‌ಕಾರ್ಟ್‌ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಮಾಡುವುದಿಲ್ಲ.

HE WAS SO RUDE...  am i fool here who is wasting time in making phones to customer care for hours. if its defective than its defective. how can you say that everything is fine in your phone. he doesnt have any courtesy. he didnt even apologize for inconvenience caused..  in my call of 20 minutes . he have told me to visit service centre..more than 30 times.  i work for the service industry too and i told him i dont have time to visit as my office is 30 KM far away from city. and i live alone here. but he was so rude that everything is fine. he showed my like i m deliberately creating issue. KINDLY CHECK MY PURCHASED HISTORY IF I VE CREATED AN ISSUE FOR NO REASON. i told him if you have replacement policy than kindly replace it. but he just kept saying your phone is not having any problem.. and he calls himself a senior technician.we purchase on flipkart oz its a BRAND... and if such things will keep persisting in your company that it would be shame for you. when he kept saying that you visit service centre. that at a time i said if i visit the service centre and they tell me that the handset is having some issue than i simply asked him that than i will ask for refund as i dont want to get into trouble if i get another DEFECTIVE PIECE. but MR Nasir said that it wont happen and do wat you want i wont let REFUND HAPPEN for you.  I m in complete DILEMMA after listning to all this. this was shocking for me. i simple want REFUND coz what happens if another peice i get will be a defective one. i ve already felt insulted on my brothers birthday. my order no is OD202942138538673700.. I ORDERED IT ON 25 MAY. MODEL NAME REDMI 2.  i still feel someone is listening to me in flipkart. WAITING FOR A CURE....

questions: Do you obey or follow any ethics in your business model?
Why do you send me fake offers?

message:
Flipkart, Today i had ordered samsung tab. Order id: OD303145413835414500.
I am a flipkart first customer.
Without informing or complimenting or not even notifying, my order got cancelled. 
Do you obey or follow any ethics in your business model?
Is this the way you treat your customers?
I have wasted my whole day in searching and ordering accessories for the tab. I know how much time i wasted. I value Time more than money.
Why do you send me fake offers? 
This is not the first time to happen for me. Is this the way you value your customers? 
I went into deep depression by seeing the way you guys wasted my day. It may be nothing for big companies like flipkart, but it means a lot to middle class workers like me both mentally and financially. 
You people will never understand the pain in this kind of feeling.
I even tried to contact the higher officials directly over phone, but after 20 mins of being on hold, i finally got a reply that no higher official is available to talk.
So is this the way you compliment your regular and trusted customers?
If there is a technical glitch, why dont you process the order? That's the way you have to compensate. But instead, why should I bear the punishment when the error is on your side? 
Now don't reply me saying sorry, i am fed up with those responses.
I want you to divert this mail to the highest official, and let him understand my pain over this issue.
I ordered the product in the morning.
The order status changed to "packing" within a hour. Then it changed to "Shipped", then i got confirmation with tracking that the product will be delivered tomorrow. So even after shipping, you cancelled the order and processed the refund without any ethics, in an informal way. 
I am feeling ashamed for recommending flipkart to my friends and relatives all these years.
I don't know what flipkart will lose in this order, but i can guarantee you, you lost your most loving customer for sure.

The only way you can compliment me is by re-confirming the order. If there is any chance. That's what i am expecting, not your apology mails. So don't send me apology mails or replies. I am not writing this mail for apologies. Hope you understand and take the right move.

Thank you for the honoring and privileged customer service and shopping experience. And please don't send me any fake offers again, this is not the first time.
